00048       struct tServerListItem{
00049         std::string creation;    
00050         const char* name;        
00051         const char* description; 
00052         const char* ipAdress;    
00053         const char* port;        
00054         const char* techNote;    
00055         unsigned int maxClients; 
00056         unsigned int actClients; 
00057       };
00058 
00062       typedef std::list<tServerListItem*> tServerList;
00063 
00065       enum tAddServerReturn{
00066         ASR_CREATED,           //<! The server is successfully created
00067         ASR_INVALID_NAME,      //<! The name is not correct
00068         ASR_INVALID_IP,        //<! The ip adress is not correct
00069         ASR_INVALID_PORT,      //<! The port is not correct
00070         ASR_EXISTS             //<! The name is already in use
00071       };
